# Project report 19 May 2021

## Editorial assistance 

- System for AE operations implemented
- Additional routines for AE paper handling

## Software development

- Web site deployment shifted from svn to github
- Keyword matching function for finding potential reviewers for articles

## Web site development

- New draft web site, where articles are delivered as html and pdf, available at https://rjournal-distill.netlify.app
- July issue 2021 will be made available in both old and new style
